attributes.action: promote a very important documentary called Zeitgeist portraying the true reality of our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This documentary is free, and can be viewed on the internet via streaming. It was made by Peter Joseph and is called Zeitgeist. There are now two films. The first documentary is called Zeitgeist - The Movie. The second is called Zeitgeist II Addendum. It talks about controversial subjects, well what we are taught to be controversial. It is important that we truly understand what is happening on out planet. A planet at war with its' self. It's time to start the revolution of consciousness.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
